/* USE : PopupMapper.getAgencyList */ SELECT AGENCY_CD, AGENCY_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE P_AGENCY_CD IS NOT NULL
AND (AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} OR P_AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd})
AND AGENCY_CD LIKE '%'||#{srchAgencyCd}||'%'
AND AGENCY_NM LIKE '%'||#{srchAgencyNm}||'%'
ORDER BY AGENCY_CD ASC

/* USE : PopupMapper.getHqList */
SELECT tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tho.OWNER_NM, tho.SYS_STAT_FG, tho.CLS_FG, NVL(thq.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_0027, NVL(thq43.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_0043, NVL(tcm124.NMCODE_CD, '') AS DIGIT8_STORE, NVL(thq1250.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_1250, NVL(thq1262.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_1262, NVL(thq1114.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_1114
FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '0027' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '0043' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq43, ( SELECT NMCODE_CD, NMCODE_ITEM_1 FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '124' ) tcm124, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '1250' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq1250, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '1262' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq1262, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '1114' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq1114 WHERE thq.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thq43.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tcm124.NMCODE_ITEM_1 (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thq1250.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thq1262.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thq1114.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND (tho.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} OR tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = '00000')
ORDER BY tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD ASC
